sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Maneuver) Once per game session, the character may spend a maneuver to make a Hard (3 difficulty dice) Knowledge (Education) check. Success means the character is familiar with a building or capital ship's design. He now knows the location of critical components or facilities within the ship or vehicle, as well as his own location. He can also plan unconventional routes around obstacles. Additional success, advantage, or triumph results can reveal other useful information at the GM's discretion.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Known Schematic</name> <number>TAL0001191</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-10-14 11:26:49</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2cfe7f962f3f1490e0f497eef699b61b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-14 11:26:49</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
